LayoutXML:
<layout>
  <tabs>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="Details" />
      </text>
      <section>
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Key Information" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="1" fieldid="CON_NAME" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Name" />
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="CON_ACCOUNTNAME" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Account##" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="1" fieldid="CON_SHORT_NAME" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Short Name" />
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="CON_TITLE" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Title" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CON_REPORTTO" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Report To" />
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="CON_LEAD_SOURCE" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Lead## Source" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CON_BIRTH_DATE" valign="top" fieldtype="8">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Birth Date" />
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="CON_ANNIVERSARY_DATE" valign="top" fieldtype="8">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Anniversary Date" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="1" fieldid="CON_CONTACT_OWNER" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Contact## Owner" />
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="CON_DEPARTMENT" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Department" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CON_CAMPAIGN" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Campaign" />
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="CON_EMAIL_OPT_OUT" valign="top" fieldtype="10">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Email Opt Out" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CON_STATUSCODE" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="StatusCode" />
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="CON_STAGE" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Stage" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="CON_CONTACT_ROLE" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Contact## Role" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="CON_PREFERRED" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Preferred Channel" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
      <section>
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Contact Information" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CON_PHONE" valign="top" fieldtype="7">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Phone" />
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="CON_EMAIL" valign="top" fieldtype="5">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Email" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CON_OFFICE_PHONE" valign="top" fieldtype="7">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Office Phone" />
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="CON_FAX" valign="top" fieldtype="7">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Fax" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CON_MOBILE" valign="top" fieldtype="7">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Mobile" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CON_PERSONAL_ADDRESS" colspan="3" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Personal Address" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CON_OFFICIAL_ADDRESS" colspan="3" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Official Address" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
      <section containscustominfo="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Additional Information" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CON_DESCRIPTION" colspan="3" valign="top" fieldtype="9">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Description" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Useful Links" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CON_WEBINTEGRATION_LINKS" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="37" listingtype="0" fieldtype="0">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Web Integration URL Links" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="Activities" />
      </text>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Open Activities" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CON_OPEN_ACTIVITIES" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="43" listingtype="3" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Open Activities" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Closed Activities" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CON_CLOSED_ACTIVITIES" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="43" listingtype="4" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Closed Activities" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="Mailing List" />
      </text>
      <section showtext="true" containscustominfo="false">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Mailing List" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" readonly="0" fieldid="CON_RELATED_MAILINGLIST" fieldtype="40" relatedtype="12" listingtype="18" deftype="0" defexp="" valign="middle" colspan="4" showlabel="false">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Mailing Lists" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="##Opportunities##" />
      </text>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Open ##Opportunities##" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CON_OPEN_OPPORTUNITIES" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="8" listingtype="19" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Open ##Opportunities##" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Closed ##Opportunities##" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CON_CLOSED_OPPORTUNITIES" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="8" listingtype="20" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Closed ##Opportunities##" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="Collaboration" />
      </text>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Related ##Issues##" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CON_RELATED_ISSUES" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="19" listingtype="7" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Related ##Issues##" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Related ##Requirements##" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CON_RELATED_REQUIREMENTS" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="52" listingtype="8" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Related ##Requirements##" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="Attachments" />
      </text>
      <section showtext="true" containscustominfo="false">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Attached Notes and Documents" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" readonly="0" fieldid="CON_RELATED_ATTACHMENTS" fieldtype="40" relatedtype="129" listingtype="0" deftype="0" defexp="" valign="middle" colspan="4" showlabel="false">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Attached Notes and Documents" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="##Notes##" />
      </text>
      <section showtext="true" containscustominfo="false">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Related NOTES" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" readonly="0" fieldid="CON_RELATED_NOTES" fieldtype="40" relatedtype="4" listingtype="5" deftype="0" defexp="" valign="middle" colspan="4" showlabel="false">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Related NOTES" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="History" />
      </text>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="##Contact## History" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CON_HISTORY" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="5" listingtype="6" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Contact## History" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" hotkey="" text="##Leads##" />
      </text>
      <section showtext="true" containscustominfo="false">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Related ##Leads##" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" readonly="0" readonlytype="0" fieldid="CON_RELATED_LEADS" fieldtype="40" relatedtype="6" deftype="0" defexp="" listingype="14" listingid="-1" valign="top" colspan="4" showlabel="false">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Related ##Leads##" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row isblank="1" />
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
  </tabs>
</layout>
